26/* This is the default implementation of the thread pool management
27 for libgomp. This type is private to the library. */
28
29#ifndef GOMP_POOL_H
30#define GOMP_POOL_H 1
31
32#include "libgomp.h"
33
34/* Get the thread pool, allocate and initialize it on demand. */
35
36static inline struct gomp_thread_pool *
37gomp_get_thread_pool (struct gomp_thread *thr, unsigned nthreads)
38{
39 struct gomp_thread_pool *pool = thr->thread_pool;
40 if (__builtin_expect (pool == NULL, 0))
41 {
42 pool = gomp_malloc (sizeof (*pool));
43 pool->threads = NULL;
44 pool->threads_size = 0;
45 pool->threads_used = 0;
46 pool->last_team = NULL;
47 pool->threads_busy = nthreads;
48 thr->thread_pool = pool;
49 pthread_setspecific (gomp_thread_destructor, thr);
50 }
51 return pool;
52}
53
54static inline void
55gomp_release_thread_pool (struct gomp_thread_pool *pool)
56{
57 /* Do nothing in the default implementation. */
58}
59
60static inline pthread_attr_t *
61gomp_adjust_thread_attr (pthread_attr_t *attr, pthread_attr_t *mutable_attr)
62{
63 /* Do nothing in the default implementation. */
64 return attr;
65}
66
67#endif /* GOMP_POOL_H */
68
